data.name: TEKKEN 7 - DLC3: Noctis Lucis Caelum Pack
data.detailed_description:
Noctis, the 114th heir apparent to the Lucian throne, joins the fray from FINAL FANTASY XV! Experience a new level of combat as you warp around the enemy while invoking Armiger, the power of kings! This pack also includes the exclusive stage "HAMMERHEAD," as well as the BGM "Stand Your Ground / FINAL FANTASY XV," the BGM "APOCALYPSIS NOCTIS Remix / TEKKEN 7," and five Noctis costumes!

*Included in this add-on are Noctis Lucis Caelum as a playable character, as well as costumes for Noctis and a new stage. Noctis Lucis Caelum will also become playable in DLC1's new mode, "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL."

*Entire Body and Hairstyle will be customizable with Noctis-specific items only. Certain other part categories are not customizable.
data.about_the_game:
Noctis, the 114th heir apparent to the Lucian throne, joins the fray from FINAL FANTASY XV! Experience a new level of combat as you warp around the enemy while invoking Armiger, the power of kings! This pack also includes the exclusive stage "HAMMERHEAD," as well as the BGM "Stand Your Ground / FINAL FANTASY XV," the BGM "APOCALYPSIS NOCTIS Remix / TEKKEN 7," and five Noctis costumes!

*Included in this add-on are Noctis Lucis Caelum as a playable character, as well as costumes for Noctis and a new stage. Noctis Lucis Caelum will also become playable in DLC1's new mode, "Ultimate TEKKEN BOWL."

*Entire Body and Hairstyle will be customizable with Noctis-specific items only. Certain other part categories are not customizable.
data.short_description: Noctis, the 114th heir apparent to the Lucian throne, joins the fray from FINAL FANTASY XV! Experience a new level of combat as you warp around the enemy while invoking Armiger, the power of kings!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
